meanings.sent1: The cave's unplumbed depths held many mysteries.
meanings.sent2: The team decided to leave the unplumbed forest untouched.
meanings.sent3: The detective's unplumbed curiosity led to solving the case.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an unplumbed well of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The ocean's unplumbed secrets beckoned to the adventurous.

meanings.definition: Not measured in depth or extent
meanings.sent1: The unplumbed lake seemed bottomless to the swimmers.
meanings.sent2: The mountain range's unplumbed valleys were hidden from view.
meanings.sent3: The unplumbed bucket left the gardener guessing about its capacity.
meanings.sent4: His unplumbed knowledge of the subject surprised his classmates.
meanings.sent5: The unplumbed darkness of the cave made the explorers cautious.
